lenders.name: HOPEsudbury
lenders.loan_because: After the tragic events of September 11, 2001, people in Sudbury joined together and asked, "What can we do to help?" The Sudbury Public Schools Superintendent and Town Manager called a few people to meet. Those people called a few more and HOPEsudbury was born—a diverse group of residents, town employees and business people—young and old—joining together as a community to help others who might need support, encouragement and financial assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: Since its establishment in 2002, HOPEsudbury (which stands for Humanitarian Outreach Project) has sponsored a variety of activities and events designed to strengthen community ties while raising money, collecting items and showing support for people in need.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to improve their lives.  I prefer microlending to making donations because I can see how the funds are bring used and can loan again when the funds are repaid.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: It provides me an opportunity to assist someone I otherwise probably couldn't.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are working to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a geography teacher.  Hopefully, I give my students an appreciation of the world around us.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to make a difference in their lives and the lives of those around them.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: Having lived in many of the countries your applicants come from, I am fully aware of their needs but also their determination and honesty.
lenders.occupational_info: As a retired teacher, I now spend much time sewing, quilting and working with fabric. I loved the local fabric crafts of Africa and India where I spent many years and support these efforts wholeheartedly.

lenders.name: Caci
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and the stories are great. I can't wait to see how these people progress and thrive!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an account manager for a large packaging firm in the US - my customer is a major retailer, with 167 stores across America.

lenders.name: Kevin Flahaut
lenders.loan_because: I've been very blessed and feel like it's my obligation, even in some small way to help others who are trying to better their lives.

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: I am my sister's keeper.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance at the opportunities I take for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an environmental organization that works to save the planet. It is called Greenpeace.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: I have lived all over the world (including Uganda where I left my heart) and think that microfinance is the most amazing and direct way to impact the lives of individuals who want to better themselves and their communities.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: There is a disparity that I can remedy in some small way.  With Kiva, my small loans go a long way. I want my daughter and son to appreciate their privilege and share what we have.
lenders.occupational_info: I help dying people and their families in the final weeks and days of life.

lenders.name: innocent
lenders.loan_because: i am presently recording an album with some street children in my country sierra leone, i am a well recorgnise musician, i strongly believe that we will make a lot of money after we finish the album.
lenders.occupational_info: 80 percent of the  money i make each year  goes to the street children, because i my self was raised in the street, so my work presently is to raise money with my talent and the talents i found in the street children

lenders.name: Fortunate Moms
lenders.loan_because: It is important to all of us that we share our good fortunes as well as set an example for our children to do what we can to help improve the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: We have many different jobs but our most important role is that of mother.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I would not be moving forward in life if not for the help and generosity others have bestowed upon us. It's time to give back to the people who need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people train their dogs to be well behaved.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable people to live their life to the fullest.
lenders.occupational_info: Very chaotic at times.  The phones never stops ringing. The bulk of my day is spent editing and proofing legal documents.   One must know legal terminology as well as real estate terms.

lenders.name: Bonnie Irene
lenders.loan_because: My background is in microfinance and this is a way for me to stay involved at a program-like level!
lenders.occupational_info: I help nonprofits strengthen their programs so that more and better services get to those that need them.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help people help themselves. I don't agree with "handouts," but I very much agree with lending people a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: A portion of my first paycheck went to my second loan here. I hope to continue to lend for as long as this site exists :)

lenders.name: charles
lenders.occupational_info: Technology

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: Such a small gift for me can have such a huge impact on someone half way around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional singer, and I teach other professional singers.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because:
Oak Brook, Il.
United States

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it's time for people to finance people.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. But there is no real security in what is no longer meaningful. There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people who find it difficult to get money pick themselves up and run their own lives
lenders.occupational_info: Oil Industry

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Jeannette
lenders.loan_because:
es gibt nichts Gutes, ausser man tut es......
People who want to start a business in order to get a better live shoud'nt get stucked because of a lack of money

lenders.name: Dave and Polly
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to us and I think He likes it when we  share our blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Scientist

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in the world who are not as fortunate as I am here in the United States and play a small role in assisting others to be self sufficient and enjoy the pleasures of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a television cameraman in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. I work for a Public Broadcasting television/radio station and shoot video for documentaries, as well as various other jobs related to TV production.

lenders.name: Rachael
lenders.loan_because: I am addicted to what I see in potential.

lenders.name: Rajib
lenders.loan_because: i loan because
lenders.occupational_info: I 'm SE

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.occupational_info: ICT, mobile world, linux and other things

lenders.name: Karim
lenders.loan_because: I like to give, especially to those who appreciate what they will receive, and make good use of ot.
lenders.occupational_info: At my job I design websites

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have a duty to help one another as much we can within our means.  I believe this duty extends beyond race, nationality and gender and I am happy to be participating in helping to progress the future of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Religious Studies student.  At the moment I study through a distance learning course at the Open University (they are quite well known in the U.K.) and in the future I hope to have the chance to complete a post-graduate degree in a field associated with Eastern religion.

lenders.name: Garner
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the gifts I've been given in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly people around in airplanes

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I believe a small helping hand can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the implementation of systems, applications, and services for large corporations.

lenders.name: Katie M.
lenders.loan_because: it really can change lives.

lenders.name: Justin & Casee
lenders.occupational_info: We are both currently students at The University of Tennessee. Casee is a English major and Justin is a Finance major.

lenders.name: Zak
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: You just have to love the human side of capitalism
lenders.occupational_info: I design wind turbines

lenders.name: Tami
lenders.loan_because: While traveling in Cambodia, my partner and I had the chance to help a family have a well dug for their home; they only had access to rice paddy water.  The well was dug in just a few days and we got to see the family use it before we returned home. It was so gratifying to see how a little money made a big difference to the lives of this farming family.  Kiva lets me continue to make a small difference in the lives of other families who need a helping hand.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: helping others isn't an option for me.

lenders.name: Dirk
lenders.loan_because: It`s fascinating to get in touch with other people in other parts of the world. And they are Your business partners more or less, they are no beggars ! I hope this makes them feel proud.
lenders.occupational_info: Organizing railway operation and especially railway construction work für Deutsche Bahn (German Railway Company).

lenders.name: Race & Brianne
lenders.loan_because: We want to spread our Aloha onto others.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.occupational_info: I live in New Haven, Connecticut where I work in the Yale University Library as the librarian for U.S. history and American Studies (which means that I purchase history-related materials for the library).  A U.S. citizen by birth, my background is (Malaysian) Chinese and Irish.  Through my travels and reading I have developed a special affection for Mexico and Mexican culture.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Kumud
lenders.loan_because: it can make a difference to someone's life.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the most brilliant innovation in charity since charity. That someone can dedicate as little as $25 of their wealth to allow it to help endless amounts of people is truly revolutionary.
lenders.occupational_info: I study political science at Temple University in Philadelphia and write for various publications at my school and in the city. And every country has school and writing, so little explanation is needed.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: I applaud the entrepreneurial spirit, and delight in helping others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
I teach classes and write books to help adults learn and become more productive with engineering software.  I also assist non-profit groups and indigenous people in learning to use GPS, mapping and surveying technology to better manage their spatial data and land use.

I am a geographer - I love international travel, meeting terrific people and documenting my journeys through art, photography and writing.

The fellow at left is not me, 'tis Samuel Clemens (aka Mark Twain -  one of my favorite authors), observing a dramatic demonstration in the laboratory of Nikola Tesla, an entrepreneur whose ideas utterly eclipsed those of Edison, Bell and Ford combined.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe individuals should help individuals. This site helps people who want learn "to fish".
lenders.occupational_info: I go to university and I work in a Museum.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: This organization makes it so easy to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: Professor

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I should.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: When I realize how fortunate I am and how little it takes to really help someone change their life it's hard not to loan through Kiva.  By helping one person improve their life we can impact many people around them, not just family, but others in the community as well. I prefer loaning to women since they traditionally have the hardest time getting regular loans.

lenders.name: Joe & Simone
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are survivors, not lucky enought to have been born in a land of abundance.  I'm also trying to teach my daughter what it means to help and how to improve this bizarre planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for lawyers who represent people in legal disputes or who the government has accused of committing a crime.  Simone is 5 years old and likes to grow vegetables and herbs.

lenders.name: Nate
lenders.occupational_info: Student in my first year of medical school.  My wife Amelia is a high school English teacher.

lenders.name: Julene
lenders.loan_because: I love to travel and want to improve the world we live in.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with people in an organization to improve their skills in leadership, project management and teamwork. Improving the business with the coordination of people.

lenders.name: The B-C Family
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed throughout our lives and want to extent those same blessings on to other families around the world.

lenders.name: LUIS
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and it's time to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Sell real estate in Los Angeles

lenders.name: leslie, allen, & boys
lenders.loan_because: I believe in changing the world one person/family at a time. I want to raise my sons do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my days taking care of my three little boys. At night I paint and sell my work on the internet. My husband is an engineer, he builds things.

lenders.name: Merle
lenders.loan_because: As a retired banker I know credit can change individual lives, families and communities.

lenders.name: HUM 455 -  Spring 2008
lenders.loan_because: We want to put what we are learning in class into practice in the real world.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to, the first two loans were a gift to my mom for mother's day
lenders.occupational_info: University student studying land use planning in Wisconsin

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people all around the world to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college students history and current events and issues, and, as director of an Honors Program/College, I help motivated students to be the best that they can be and accomplish as much as they can.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: It should be our responsibility to help eachother reguardless of ethnicity, gender or geography.  I want to help others especially who are pro-active in helping themselves, their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Pathology lab at a University hospital  were I dissect surgical specimens, preform post mortem exams and help train medical students.

lenders.name: Rachael
lenders.loan_because: I LEND because friends lent money to me years ago and it made all the difference in my life.  I am lucky,  I work hard, and I never forget the importance of the circle of giving and receiving.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and run three guesthouses, little hotels in the city.  I have about 30 people working for me.  Most of them, and many of my guests come from foreign lands.  While my work does not allow me to travel, it gives me the privilege of meeting and getting to know people from everywhere.

lenders.name: Dana & Kimberlea
lenders.loan_because: We are called of God to spend ourselves on behalf of others, to loose the chains of injustice.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide a haven of safety for abandoned and neglected children.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: by many standards I may not have much, but I am blessed with what I do have.  If we aren't here to help others, what are we here for?
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate a courthouse facility that handles criminal cases for kids under the age of 18 years.

lenders.name: Stephen and Erika
lenders.loan_because: We own two businesses and sometimes folks need to reach out to help your business grow.  Our family has been fortunate to have a terrific customer base, We want to see other folks in our world succeed in their own business venture by sharing the fruit of our success.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a summer day camp for children - in the summer months when school is not in session they come to our property and play, swim, boat.  During the school year we operate our construction and home repair business.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: The world has loaned so much to me for the brief time I am here on the planet......
lenders.occupational_info: I have the opportunity to listen to people as they share personal life stories, including the good and the diifficult details,The sharing with another neutral person, seems to assist in working through life's many traumas.  It is incredible to be a small part so many lives.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I have so much.  They have so little.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.  I like donating money but I think lending money will help me spend  my money wiser.  I am not a rich person, but I have money to share, and if I loan the money and get it back, that can maximise the amount of money I have to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with multiply disabled children and I love having the opportunity to smile and laugh with them everyday! :)

lenders.name: CATHERINE
lenders.loan_because: Hola, mi edad es de 24 tengo una nena de 3 .Necesito trabajar para poder salir adelante.Doy el servicio de manicura, pedicura y unas de acrilico pero no he podido habilitar un salon para dar todo el servicio de bellea como cortes , tintes etc.Ya q mi situacion economica no me lo ha permitido.He visitado varios lugares para ver un prestamo y asi empezar a trabajar pero en ningun lado me lo dan porque no puedo comprobar ingresos.Ojala aqui si se pueda.Esto seria un gran empujon para que salga adelante y para devolverlo, muchas gracias.
lenders.occupational_info: Como algo noble, que hace q la mujer se sienta mas bella de lo q es.Al igual q los hombres.

lenders.name: John Rynne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a lot of small contributions can make a huge difference in ordinary people's lives, helping small businesses get off the ground.
lenders.occupational_info: I translate written texts (mainly financial documents) from Spanish into English.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back some of the good that has come my way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a continuing care centre as a Food Service Aide.

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good helping entrepreneurs rise to their potential.  Capital is a tool every bit as necessary to an entrepreneur as a hammer is to a carpenter.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a company where I help make mobile devices.  Regardless of the brand, I believe mobile devices have the capability of empowering people economically and politically, and I want to help enable the virtuous cycle by donating!

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I Can
lenders.occupational_info: I fly airplanes

lenders.name: killu
lenders.loan_because: We have benefited from being given chances, and would like to give back - what is a small, ordinary contirbution to us may turn into something extraordinary for others, just as has happened to us in years past. We would also like to teach our children to become conscientious citizens of the world, to help people help themselves, and to nurture entrepreneurial spirit by watching real life successes and failures. Kiva is good for the soul of the giver and the receiver.
lenders.occupational_info: We work in the field of biotechnology aimed at developing new medical breakthroughs in treatment and prevention of disease.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Every one should have the opportunity to be in control of their own destiny.  I believe this is definately one way to take control.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get a fair trial when they are accused of a crime.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: It makes the money I set aside to help others go further.

lenders.name: Owen
lenders.loan_because: Hoy para ti, mañana para mi.

lenders.name: Darla
lenders.loan_because: I can connect with the world in my own small way and help others who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in software sales.

lenders.name: Lolo
lenders.loan_because: I am deeply impressed and affected by the ingenuity of this effort and of the people it touches.
lenders.occupational_info: Since 1983, I haved worked as a registered nurse, caring for tiny or sick babies from all over Alaska. I love what I do and am so fortunate to work with an amazing group of people. I am also a proud member of "Kiva Nurses", an awesome lending group with caring people from throughout the world.

lenders.name: ange
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together :-)

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I believe making the world a better place can happen one small step at a time.

lenders.name: DENNY
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to support it because I wanted to support my friend Brooke, and also because I think the idea itself is very good, and I am in a position to benefit these people so wanted to do my bit, although I'm not limiting myself just to this.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: As a struggling small business owner I know how difficult it is to get started.  This is an amazing opportunity to pay it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in detailed travel planning to off the beaten track destinations.  My goal is to create truly unique experiences and trips of a lifetime.  I firmly believe that travel not only opens the mind of the traveler, but it also helps support a local community.  A winning combination!

lenders.name: Gwendolyn
lenders.loan_because: I have a small retail mobile reloading business and I want to expand it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of 5 kids and my husband is working as a customer service representative.  I am selling/retailing mobile loads to help my husband to support our big family and for an additional income for our daily sustainance . 4 of kids are in school and my husband's income is enough to support my children's education and daily needs.  I want to have a stall for my business so I can easily be reach by my customers since I am only based at home

lenders.name: The Stong Family
lenders.loan_because: We like helping fellow entrepreneurs and know how valuable a helping hand can be.  Especially in the early going.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell gifts on the internet.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: give other people a chance at a better life
lenders.occupational_info: work in finance for the Education Dept.

lenders.name: ritchell
lenders.loan_because: i want to have a small business to finance our daily needs.and if will be successful on it i wanted to enroll my younger sisiter in college because she havent been in school for 2 years.the moment she finished her highschool.
lenders.occupational_info: actually iwas working as a contractual,after 6 months my contract has ended ,and for now im still looking for job,thats why while i still look for another one,i wanted to try a small business.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I recently visited Kenya and found a desperate need for aid in the medical field.

lenders.name: Robert & Brigitt
lenders.loan_because: We believe in small family and group enterprises as key players in economic and social development. Our personal sympathy is for Southeast Asia.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help individuals and communities while allowing people to maintain their independence. Its contractual, accountable and effective.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in sales and marketing
